name: wp-skeleton-app
description: > This is a work in progress. Subject to sweeping changes at random intervals until the 1.0.0 :)

scripts.release-patch: VERSION_=`node -pe "require('./package.json').version"` && NEXT_VERSION_=`node -pe "require('semver').inc('$VERSION_', 'patch')"` && node -e "var j = require('./package.json'); j.version = '$NEXT_VERSION_';var s = JSON.stringify(j, null, 2); require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', s);" && git commit -m "release $NEXT_VERSION_" -- package.json && git tag "$NEXT_VERSION_" -m "release $NEXT_VERSION_"
scripts.release-minor: VERSION_=`node -pe "require('./package.json').version"` && NEXT_VERSION_=`node -pe "require('semver').inc('$VERSION_', 'minor')"` && node -e "var j = require('./package.json'); j.version = '$NEXT_VERSION_';var s = JSON.stringify(j, null, 2); require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', s);" && git commit -m "release $NEXT_VERSION_" -- package.json && git tag "$NEXT_VERSION_" -m "release $NEXT_VERSION_"
scripts.release-major: VERSION_=`node -pe "require('./package.json').version"` && NEXT_VERSION_=`node -pe "require('semver').inc('$VERSION_', 'major')"` && node -e "var j = require('./package.json'); j.version = '$NEXT_VERSION_';var s = JSON.stringify(j, null, 2); require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', s);" && git commit -m "release $NEXT_VERSION_" -- package.json && git tag "$NEXT_VERSION_" -m "release $NEXT_VERSION_"
